quote: Dream by making and make by dreaming.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Dream, Dream DreamDreams transform into thoughts And thoughts result in action.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quote: A dream is a seed.Vision plants it.Imagination nurtures growth.Opportunities create blooms.Thoughts become things!
author: Donna McGoff

quote: I don't dream at night, I dream at day, I dream all day; I'm dreaming for living.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Transform into your dream.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: A dream is a wish your heart makes, when you're fast asleep.
author: Walt Disney Company,  Cinderella: A Little Golden Book

quote: Between living and dreaming there is a third thing. Guess it.
author: Antonio Machado

quote: The concept of dreaming is known to the waking mind but to the dreamer there is no waking, no real world, no sanity; there is only the screaming bedlam of sleep.
author: Stephen King,  Rose Madder

quote: Dreaming is the poetry of Life, and we must be forgiven if we indulge in it a little.
author: John Galsworthy,  Five Speeches to P.E.N. Clubs and a Letter

quote: I live not in dreams but in contemplation of a reality that is perhaps the future.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Dream is not that which you see while sleeping it is something that does not let you sleep.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam,  Wings of Fire: An Autobiography

quote: Dreams are only dreams until you wake up and make them real.
author: Ned Vizzini,  It's Kind of a Funny Story

quote: My dream, is to dream, a dream.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Dreams are not those which comes while we are sleeping, but dreams are those when u don't sleep before fulfilling them.
author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam,  Wings of Fire: An Autobiography

quote: I dream. Sometimes I think that's the only right thing to do.
author: Haruki Murakami,  Sputnik Sweetheart

quote: Fully inhale your dream and completely exhale manifestation of it.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: The possibility of the dream gives strength.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita,  Pearls of Wisdom: Great mind

quote: I dream like a dew drop in the nightThen glitter in the morning sunlightThen it evaporates to embrace the sky
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I'm living a dream I never want to wake up from.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: We dream in our waking moments, and walk in our sleep.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne,  The Scarlet Letter

quote: It is our action that determines the viability of our dream.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for the real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Strange, I thought, how you can be living your dreams and your nightmares at the very same time.
author: Ransom Riggs,  Hollow City

quote: Dreams only come true if youpoint yourself in their direction
author: Tina Reber,  Love Unrehearsed

quote: The ability to dream is all I have to give. That is my responsibility; that is my burden. And even I grow tired.
author: Harlan Ellison,  Stalking the Nightmare

quote: When you believe and act on your dreams, your dreams will become a reality.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Sometimes I dreamthat everything in the world is here, in my room, in a great closet, named and orderly,and I am here too, in front of it, hardly able to see for the flash and the brightness—and sometimes I am that madcap person clapping my hands and singing; and sometimes I am that quiet person down on my knees.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: To achieve extraordinary dreams you sometimes have to go through extraordinary nightmares.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: When you chase a dream, you learn about yourself. You learn your capabilities and limitations, and the value of hard work and persistence.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Three Weeks With My Brother

quote: Dreams are tawdry when compared with the leading of God, and not worthy of the aura of wonder we usually surround them with. God only doeth wonders. He does nothing else. His hand can work nothing less.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: Making a dream into reality begins with what you have, not with what you are waiting on.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: I sleep when I blink. I dream like I love—continuously.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: What I dream of is an art of balance, of purity and serenity devoid of troubling or depressing subject matter - a soothing, calming influence on the mind, rather like a good armchair which provides relaxation from physical fatigue.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: If your dreams seem to be drifting away, wake up!
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Far away, our dreams have nothing to do with what we do. The wind carries the night, and passes on, aimless.
author: Mahmoud Darwish,  Absent Presence

quote: Every day I type out my dream scribbles from the night before, looking for treasure buried deep in my subconscious.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: You see things; you say, 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?
author: George Bernard Shaw,  Back to Methuselah

quote: The only problem with dreaming is it's a solo activity. Imagine how glorious life would be if we could share dreams and create in unison.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quote: If God didn't want you to be a dreamer, He wouldn't go around handing out dreams! That's a clue!
author: Mark Gorman

quote: If you wake up tired, you’ve been chasing dreams. If you go to bed tired, your making your dreams happen.
author: Benny Bellamacina,  The King of Rhyme

quote: We must never stop dreaming. Dreams provide nourishment for the soul, just as a meal does for the body.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Pilgrimage

quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Eleonora

quote: Dreams are the bright creatures of poem and legend, who sport on earth in the night season, and melt away in the first beam of the sun, which lights grim care and stern reality on their daily pilgrimage through the world.
author: Charles Dickens,  Nicholas Nickleby
